Then he had to cringe his neck to make out the giant face that was just so near, now seemed a long ways away, and that evil grin beaming down at him. He stood in fear, completing regretting swearing at her like he just did. He was scared out his wits.

"Okay," she said, feigning pleasantness. "I'll help you up. Here you go."

She effortlessly lifted up her massive foot and put it on top of him. With his broken legs, he was unable to run away. She grabbed one of his broken legs with her big toes and hoisted him into the air.

"AHHHHHHHHHHHHH!" he screamed in agony as his entire body weight was supported by his already broken leg. She paid no attention to this.

He looked down and saw that he was like 50 feet off the ground, from his perspective, maybe only a foot or two from hers. Then the grip on his toe was loosened, causing him to slip. He screamed as he fell back down to the ground and landed head first on the carpet.

"Oops. Sorry. I must have let go by accident!" she innocently exclaims letting out a playful giggle. "Here let me try again."

You dropped my by accident, my ass, the doctor thought. He wanted to say that to the girl but was far to afraid. He tried to shout, "No, you don't need to try to pick me up," but with his face being smashed into the carpet, it was muffled and never came out. It was doubtful that she would have listened to him anyways.

Within seconds, he felt her foot come on top of him as he was picked up. This time it was by the face, which gave him less pain than being picked up by his broken legs, but he couldn't see and could barely breath as his face was compressed into her big toe. Even though he could barely breath, he was perfectly able to take in the stench of her foot, almost making him want to puke.

Like before, after she had picked him up to a good height, she "accidentally" let go and dropped him onto the carpet. This time he landed on his broken legs and felt like the few bones in his leg that didn't brake after his first fall were surely broken now. This was repeated several times to the delight of the teenage girl until the doctor could barely breath. Each time he was picked up either by his broken legs or his head. Each had their share of discomforts.

"Okay," he shouted up to her. "I don't think you'll be able to pick me up. Thanks anyways."

"Ohh, I'm so sorry. I thought I could. Well I tried," she replied. So all I had to do was ask her and she'll stop, the doctor thought, well this was too easy. He was suspicious.

"I guess if you can't be helped up. You have no chance of survival.You must be put out of your misery." She pretended to sound sympathetic. She winked with her pretty, large eyes down at him and then smiled.

"No! That's not what I meant," the doctor protested, but she wasn't listening. He saw her foot loom above him and lower on top of him. She put pressure on him, causing considerable pain. He shouted "Stop! Stop! Please!" But she didn't. She slowly increased the pressure until it felt like his organs were about to explode. Then suddenly she released the pressure. Her foot was still directly above him, just not pushing down.

"I can't do this," she said as if she wasn't enjoying it. "I'm too much of a wimp to do what needs to be done."

"Please don't then!" the doctor replied.

"I know. I know. I don't want to kill you," she answered pretending that he was pleading for her to kill him. "But for you sake I just go to suck it up and do it."

He tried to shout back, but her foot started to put pressure on him again, and he could barely breathe. Like before she kept on increasing pressure, but then right before his body exploded, she released him and state that she can't go through with this, and then "try again" to kill him in just another moment. She repeated this again and again. She was having so much fun toying with her plaything, much to his discomfort as he was smashed over and over again until he felt like his body couldn't take much anymore.

Eventually after what seemed like hours of such torture, he couldn't take it anymore. He realized that he wasn't going to make it alive anyways, so he might as well just end it here. As she took one of her I-can't-do-it breaks, he said, "Okay. Just get it over with!"

Her face, which was just pretending to be sad and regretful instantly turned happy as if the confirmation she had been waiting for all along had just come.

"Oh okay. I just realized that I didn't need to kill you just because of a broken leg and that you'd probably survive the pain, but if you want put out of your misery."

Before he could respond, her foot came charging down on him, and he was no more than a stain on her carpet and foot.

She then looked at the plane full of terrified plane passengers who had just watched the entire ordeal. She reached her hand into the plane. There was utter panic in the plane. She heard screams of fear and saw the desperate passengers trying to hide from her clawing fingers. Their attempts mostly failed, and she easily clasped her hands around four more captors. She hoisted them to her face and smiled as she saw their terrified expressions.
